extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of Oracle Java SE or Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Oracle Critical Patch Update
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest fixes from the Oracle Critical Patch Update Advisory - April 2022 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Network Protocols Required by Attack
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce the risk of successful attack by blocking network protocols required by the attack. Test changes on non-production systems to avoid breaking application functionality.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Unnecessary Privileges or Package Access
extracted_playbook.description: For attacks requiring certain privileges or access to certain packages, remove these from users who do not need them. Test changes on non-production systems to avoid breaking application functionality.
